languages.text: "Зря ты так. Мог ведь вообще в шлюз отправиться. Ты уже тогда был дряхлым старпером".
"You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."
languages.original_text: "Зря ты так. Мог ведь вообще в шлюз отправиться. Ты уже тогда был дряхлым старпером".

traits.locale_text: "You shouldn't be so harsh. You could have gotten dumped into the lock as well. You were already a decrepit old-fart back then, after all."
"You shouldn't be so harsh. You could have gotten dumped into the lock as well. You were already a decrepit old-fart back then, after all."
"You shouldn't be so harsh. You could have got dumped into the lock as well. You were already a decrepit old fart back then, after all."
"You shouldn't be so harsh. You could have got dumped into the lock as well. You were already a decrepit old fart back then, after all."
"You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."
"You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."

languages.text: « Voyez le bon côté des choses. Elle aurait pu vous balancer dans le vide par un sas comme tant d'autres. Vous étiez déjà un vieillard décrépit à l'époque, après tout. »
languages.original_text: "You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."

traits.locale_text: « Voyez le bon côté des choses. Elle aurait pu vous balancer dans le vide par un sas comme tant d'autres. Vous étiez déjà un vieillard décrépit à l'époque, après tout. »

languages.text: «No lo malinterprete. Podrían haberlo expulsado por la esclusa como a tantos otros. Al fin y al cabo, en aquella época ya era un carcamal decrépito».
languages.original_text: "You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."

traits.locale_text: «No se machaque. Puede que también esté bajo los efectos del bloqueo. Al fin y al cabo, en aquella época ya era un carcamal decrépito».

languages.text: “你想多了，毕竟她没把你和别人一起扔到气闸里，对你已经够好了。再说，你那个时候就已经是个臭老头子了，谁知道你嘴巴牢不牢？”
languages.original_text: "You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."

traits.locale_text: “你不能要求这么多，毕竟她没把你扔到气闸里，已经对你够好了。再说了，你那个时候就已经是个臭老头子了，谁知道你嘴巴牢不牢？”

languages.text: 「反対さ。あんただって他の大勢と同じように、エアロックから放り出されたかもしれないんだ。結局、あのころのあんたは、すでに老いぼれの厄介者だったんだからね」
languages.original_text: "You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに厳しく言うもんじゃないさ。あんただって放り出されたかもしれないんだ。あのころのあんたは、すでに老いぼれだったんだからね」

languages.text: "Ihr versteht das völlig falsch. Ihr hätte wie so viele andere über die Luftschleuse entsorgt werden können. Ihr wart schließlich schon damals ein abgehalfterter alter Miesepeter."
languages.original_text: "You have it all backward. You could have been dumped out the airlock like so many others. You were already a decrepit old curmudgeon back then, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Seid nicht so streng. Ihr hättet auch in die Schleuse geworfen werden können. Ihr wart schließlich schon damals ein abgehalfterter alter Knacker."
